articles.title: Florida’s COVID-19 variant cases have doubled, CDC says - WPLG Local 10
articles.description: Florida has 92 confirmed cases of a COVID-19 variant, twice as many as last week, the CDC said in new numbers released Monday. It raises concerns that a more contagious strain is spreading.
